description: Learn how to make pesto from scratch with this healthier chicken and pesto pasta salad recipe. It's a no-fuss dish perfect for weeknight dinners.
name: Healthier Chicken & Pesto Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g steam fresh beans, broccoli & sugar snap peas

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Season chicken with pepper and lightly spray with oil. Cook chicken for 6 minutes each side or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to packet instructions, adding vegetables for the last minute of cooking. Drain.

Meanwhile, process almonds until finely chopped. Add parmesan, basil, garlic and zest, then process until very finely chopped. Add oil and lemon juice and process until a paste forms. Season with pepper.
Shred chicken. Place pesto in a large bowl. Add pasta mixture and chicken and toss to combine. Add spinach and toss to combine. Divide among bowls. Serve.
